thumb.title: What the why podcast guest Richard Blank Costa Ricas Call Center
thumb.description: What The Why part of WTW Rewind Series with Barbara Anne. Season 3 Episode #4 with Richard Blank. This episode of “What The Why?!? originally aired on the RVN Television Network which is now KnetStream. While these shows are currently available on KnetStream, we are happy to share these edited versions of meaningful conversations for additional reflection and impact."What The Why?!?" hosted by Barbara Anne Gardenhire-Mills. It's a show where she interviews various leaders about their "why" – their purpose and what drives them.In our fourth season, our show features conversations with a wide variety of leaders from all walks of life about why they do what they do and how they figured things out.The first three seasons of the show, known as "What The Why?!? with Barbara Anne," are also available on select platforms and KnetStream.com."https://youtu.be/20zcT3hxwQAhttps://youtu.be/lo6D9XlVlhchttps://youtu.be/89EQxbg-2tUhttps://youtu.be/mJ6w_29aBYMhttps://youtu.be/96aWnZhTALc
